main.name: Conor Morgan
main.description: Welcome to my website! I'm a Computing Science graduate from University of Glasgow with an interest in Data Analysis and Recommender Systems. My website contains information about me and links to projects that I've worked on
main.bio_tech: Recent graduate working as a software developer. I use .Net professionally and Python in my free time. A major interest is Data Analysis and providing insightful observations with a range of data visualisation techniques.
main.bio_hobbies: I'm an avid sportsman and try to be as active as I can in my free time. I play both football and Gaelic football competitively and to keep fit
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I have good experience with a range of languages and frameworks from work, university and personal projects.

education.degree: B.Sc Computing Science with Honours of 2nd Class (Division 1)
education.desc1: Used Python and Java as main languages throughout university. Completed my dissertation implementing a recommendation system using Python, specifically Context-Aware Recommender Systems.
education.desc2: Familiar with web development frameworks Django for Python and React for JavaScript including using React for a year-long project.
education.desc3: Other notable topics were studying Database Systems with SQL, Algorithms and Data structures in Python and Java and Functional Programming with Haskell.

education.desc1: 10 GCSEs and achieved 3 A* in Maths, Spanish and IT and 5 As and 2 Bs
education.desc2: A-levels and chose Maths, Spanish and Physics and achieved an A in Maths and B grades in the others.

work.title: Junior Developer
work.desc1: Generally working with customers in the construction sector needing solutions for their building projects. Use .Net Framework/Core C# and ASP to develop bespoke apps and products for customers.
work.desc2: Apps interact with SQL Databases and Autodesk construction products (e.g Navisworks, BIM 360, Forge).
work.desc3: Completed training course in 2022 on .Net Core MVC practices.

skills.name: Version Control Systems - Git, Github, GitLab

projects.title: Premier League Nations
projects.description: My analysis of the nations that have featured in the English Premier League

projects.title: Glasgow University Football Club
projects.description: Website created for the Glasgow University Football Club
